MOSIP helps governments of countries to build a digital identity system Using this every Individual of a country can be given a Unique Identity Number UIN This helps in inclusivity and accessibility of all Individuals without disparity or discrimination The key objectives of the platform are to provide the basic framework to create a fully functional identity system provide the flexibility for a country to choose the features from the basic framework as per their requirements maintain privacy security and confidentiality of an Individuals data provide a scalable and accessible solution to cater to a wide range of population a few thousands to tens of millions and Verifyauthenticate an Individuals identity where required to provide access to services Responsibilities Created Spring Boot Doctors and Patients relation This software facilitates a doctor to get a registration which provides a quick reference of past history related to a patient like hisher symptoms drug allergies family history etc Doctors can use this information for further advises So doctors will feel simple while treating a patient which he already treated before In this system patient will also facilitate by userid and password to get online information about his family past history Test advised by Physician and All the consultation done by Physician for your family When a health professional involved at various points of Patient health care has access to Patients medical history such as allergies surgeries tests and prescriptive medications it empowers him with the ability to make better decisions services using SOAP Webservice Written the encryption decryption classes for Web Authentication for https Written DAOs and their implementations with JDBC Written JDBC Components Designed the layout of page by using struts tiles framework Project1 VINGS Client VIDAL INSURANCE NETWORK GLOBAL SERVICES Vidal Health TPA Pvt Ltd May 2016 to September 2018 Environment Java JSP Struts1 Jdbc Webservices Soap Rest Eclipse Jboss Oracle Description VINGS is a complete solution for the TPA which allows managing all health insurance data received from the insurance companies for cashless claim settlement TPA can manage the details of claims intimation advice customers on network hospitals approve cashless services and settle claims and disbursed the claims to the policy holders All these activities are maintained in VINGS application Once the policy is issued insurance companiesemployers send all the records to the TPA TPA maintains the database of the policy holders in VINGS application to process cashless and reimbursementclaim process by different teams TPA issues the identity cards to the policy holders on the basis of their records Responsibilities Designed JSPs as per the Requirement Implemented Struts1 Action Classes Implemented client and server side Validations Integrated Web services using REST Webservice Implemented Web services using SOAP Webservice Written the encryption decryption classes for Web Authentication for https Written DAOs and their implementations with JDBC Written JDBC Components Designed the layout of page by using struts tiles framework
